title: Erasmus Mundus Association-Bangladesh Symposium Series 2024
org: BU Science Club & BU Research and Higher Education Society, Barishal University
desc:
Event Title: Erasmus Mundus Association-Bangladesh Symposium Series 2024 , "A Road to Erasmus Mundus Joint Masters (EMJM) and Erasmus Mundus Scholarship"
Erasmus Mundus Joint Master (EMJMD) and the Erasmus Mundus Scholarship:
During this Master's program, a student has to study in at least two different universities in two different countries and also has the opportunity to study in more than two countries. Erasmus Mundus scholarships for students to take part in these master's programs. Last year (2023-2025 cohort) 141 Bangladeshi received this prestigious scholarship to study various Erasmus Mundus Master Programs throughout Europe. Globally, Bangladesh was in 3rd position that year regarding the number of scholarship winners. The amount of the scholarship can be 49K EURO (almost half a crore taka).
Description of EMA:
The Erasmus Mundus Association (EMA) was founded in 2006 as the European Commission (EC) initiative. EMA is registered in Brussels as an international non-profit association under Belgian Laws (EMA AISBL). EMA is an association for students and alumni of Erasmus Mundus Master programs. EMA offers advice and inspiration for EMJMD applicants.
Key Topics:
- Introduction to Erasmus Mundus Scholarship
- Application Procedures
- Required Documents
- Benefits and tricks to win Erasmus Mundus Scholarship
Speakerâ€™s Profile:
a. SM Faysal Ahmed
- Volunteer, Erasmus Mundus Association.
- Erasmus Scholar, META4.0 (2023-2025 Cohort)
- (Ecole Centrale de Lyon ENISE- France, Polytechnic University of Turin- Italy
- Norwegian University of Science and Technology -Norway,
- Technical University of Chemnitz -Germany).
b. Fahim Tahmid
- Volunteer, Erasmus Mundus Association
- Erasmus Scholar, Quality in Analytical Laboratories (2023-2025 Cohort)
- University of Algarve- Portugal,
- University of Barcelona-Spain
Event Date: 17 May,2024
Time: 3:30 PM BDT (GMT+6:00)
Platform: Zoom
Registration Link: https://forms.gle/FwESWtAWWbzB2Kyw6
Jointly Organized by Barishal University Science Club (BUSC) and Barishal University Research and Higher Education Society (BURHES) in collaboration with Erasmus Mundus Association - Bangladesh (EMA-BD)
N: B: Only Registered applicants will be notified 48 hours before the webinar via E-mail including the Zoom meeting link or Meeting details.

title: Erasmus Mundus Association-Bangladesh Symposium Series 2023
desc:
*** UPDATE: The program ZOOM LINK has been sent to your respective EMAIL addresses. If you have not received it yet, please contact us with sufficient information to hsapsbd@gmail.com. Be sure to check the spam mailbox also. ***
Good news! for those who are interested to pursue their dream of studying abroad with a prestigious scholarship. Our HSAPSB (Higher Studies Abroad for Psychology Students of Bangladesh) group in collaboration with the Erasmus Mundus Association is going to arrange an online webinar discussing the Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) and the Erasmus+ Scholarship. The webinar is going to be held on Saturday 4th of February, 2023. Those who are interested are requested to register through the QR code on the poster or the following registration link;
https://forms.gle/Li3pWkKraMShbZ1o9
We will send the meeting link via your email address after you register for the webinar.
We will greatly appreciate your humble presence in the webinar.
Event Details:
The event will cover:
â€¢ EMJMD Application Procedure, Requirements (IELTS, SOP, Job/Voluntary Experiences)
â€¢ Opportunities for Students with Psychology Background/Social Science and humanities background
â€¢ Career Opportunities After Completion
â€¢ Q & A and Discussion
About EMJMD & Scholarship
During the Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) program, a student has to study in at least two different universities in two different countries and also has the opportunity to study in more than two countries.
Erasmus+ funds scholarships for students to take part in these master's programs. This year 139 Bangladeshi have received this prestigious scholarship to study various Erasmus Mundus Master Programs throughout Europe. Globally, Bangladesh is in 3rd position this year regarding the number of scholarships received. The amount of the scholarship can be 49K EURO (almost half a crore taka).
About Erasmus Mundus Association (EMA)
The Erasmus Mundus Association (EMA) was founded in 2006 as the European Commission (EC) initiative. EMA is registered in Brussels as an international non-profit association under Belgian Laws (EMA AISBL). EMA is an association for students and alumni of Erasmus Mundus Master programs. EMA offers advice and inspiration for EMJMD applicants.
About us
Higher Studies Abroad for Psychology Students of Bangladesh (HSAPSB) is a Facebook group for Bangladeshi psychology students who are interested in pursuing higher studies abroad. The aim of this group is to build a Bangladeshi community that offers several resources and support to prospective students so that they can effectively pursue their dreams of higher education. Through communication and cooperation, this group is also trying to create a common ground for students and create a wide and strong network consisting of current and former students of Bangladeshi origin. All kinds of updates about pursuing higher studies abroad including grants, scholarships, news updates, University admissions, etc. are shared in this group. Members can also contact former students or job holders abroad from this group for information and help.

desc:

now has its eyes on 2024! EMA-BD wants more and more people from our country to pursue

title: Erasmus Mundus Association-Bangladesh Symposium Series 2023
desc:
The Erasmus Mundus Scholarship is an esteemed scholarship program that provides exceptional opportunities for international students to further their education and pursue their dreams. This scholarship program offers an incredible chance to study in prestigious universities across Europe and attain a high-quality education while experiencing diverse cultures, languages, and lifestyles.Rajshahi University Education Club, which works for Education mainly doing a collaboration with EMA. As we want RU students get a hand to hand knowledge and get to know the scopes about the scholarship from Association like EMA to Europe.


For this we are bringing this webinar to you all. This webinar requires 10 taka confirmation fee so that only interested ones can join.

Webinar details

Date :18 May 2023
Time: 3:30 pm
Last date of the registration :16 May (11:59 pm)

We will provide the zoom link the day before the webinar.

Speakers details are given bellow

Sayed Muhammad Baker
- Country Representative for Bangladesh, Erasmus Mundus Association.
- Project Engineer, COHERENT-DILAS Diodenlaser GmbH, Germany.
- PhD Candidate, Technical University of Kaiserslautern, Germany .

2. Arghya Kamol Roy
- Coordinator, Planning and Development Team (EMA- Bangladesh Team)
- Erasmus Mundus Scholar, European Masters Course Advanced Design of Ships and Offshore Structures Program




Send conformation fee to :
01600248401 - Bkash
01600248401 - Nagad
016002484011 - Rocket


For any information, do contact to: 01836764922


Registration link :
https://forms.gle/QRFmj1gD7AtR9rwn7

Note:

Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) and the Erasmus+ Scholarship:

During this Master's program, a student has to study in at least two different universities in two different countries and also has the opportunity to study in more than two countries.

Erasmus+ funds scholarships for students to take part in these master's programs. This year 139 Bangladeshi have received this prestigious scholarship to study various Erasmus Mundus Master Programs throughout Europe. Globally, Bangladesh is in 3rd position this year regarding the number of scholarships received. The amount of the scholarship can be 49K EURO (almost half a crore taka).


Description of EMA

The Erasmus Mundus Association (EMA) was founded in 2006 as the European Commission (EC) initiative. EMA is registered in Brussels as an international non-profit association under Belgian Laws (EMA AISBL). EMA is an association for students and alumni of Erasmus Mundus Master programs. EMA offers advice and inspiration for EMJMD applicants.

title: Erasmus Mundus Association-Bangladesh Symposium Series 2023
place: Online, Noakhali Science and Technology University
org: NSTU Research Society, Noakhali Science and Technology University
desc:
NSTU Research Society and Erasmus Mundus Association-Bangladesh present,
Webinar on 'A Road to Erasmus Mundus Joint Masters (EMJM) Degree and Erasmus Mundus Scholarship'
Event Detail:
This webinar is a part of the Erasmus Mundus Association-Bangladesh Symposium Series 2023. This time it is going to be held at Noakhali Science and Technology University (NSTU) in collaboration between the NSTU Research Society (NSTURS) and Erasmus Mundus Association-Bangladesh.
In the event, the attendant students are expected to be made aware of the Introduction to Erasmus Mundus Scholarship, Application procedures, Required Documents, Benefits, and tricks to win this Scholarship, etc.
Date and Time:
The webinar will be held on the coming 16th of July 2023; Sunday; at 4 PM BDT via the online platform Zoom.
Guest Speakers:
Sayed Muhammad Baker
Country Representative for Bangladesh, Erasmus Mundus Association
Project Engineer, COHERENT-DILAS Diodenlaser GmbH, Germany
PhD Candidate, Technical University of Kaiserslautern, Germany
Mohammad Hamid Al Muktadir
Volunteer, Erasmus Mundus Association
Erasmus Scholar, EMMPHID (2022-2024 Cohort)
Karolinska Institutet, Sweden and Universidad de Oviedo, Spain
Registration Link:
Register yourself within 15th July, 2023; 11:59 PM to get the webinar link.
https://forms.gle/m2w5RrLxkm3e1pMm8
Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) and the Erasmus Mundus Scholarship:
Erasmus Mundus is one of the world's most prestigious scholarship programs which is awarded by the European Union (EU) to provide the opportunity to study in different European Universities. During this Master's program, a student has to study in at least two different universities in two different countries and also has the opportunity to study in more than two countries. Erasmus Mundus, also known as Erasmus+, funds scholarships for students to take part in these master's programs. This year (2023-2025 cohort) 140+ Bangladeshis have received this prestigious scholarship to study various Erasmus Mundus Master Programs throughout Europe. Globally, Bangladesh is in the 3rd position this year regarding the number of scholarship winners. This scholarship covers tuition fees, insurance, a contribution to student travel and installation costs, as well as a monthly subsistence allowance for the entire duration of the study program. The amount of the scholarship can be 49K EURO (almost half a crore taka).
Description of EMA
The Erasmus Mundus Association (EMA) was founded in 2006 as the European Commission (EC) initiative. EMA is registered in Brussels as an international non-profit association under Belgian Laws (EMA AISBL). EMA is an association for students and alumni of Erasmus Mundus Master programs. EMA offers advice and inspiration for EMJMD applicants.
Supported by:
Bangladesh Research Society (BDRS)
Thank you. You are all warmly welcome to join the webinar.

title: Erasmus Mundus Association-Bangladesh Symposium Series 2023
desc:
Erasmus Mundus was launched in 2004 as a higher education cooperation program funded by the European Commission and continued until 2013. Beginning in 2014, Erasmus Mundus became part of the Erasmus+ funding scheme umbrella which lasted until 2020. The Erasmus+ scheme was renewed for the period of 2021-2027 and is expected to triple the number of participants. While the Erasmus Mundus Joint Ph.D. degrees no longer exist, Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree (EMJMD) programs continue to be offered under the umbrella of Erasmus+.
Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degrees (EMJMDs)
ïƒ¼ Joint Master-level study programs carried out by consortia of European universities
ïƒ¼ Provide a number of scholarships for students from the whole world to study in Europe.
ïƒ¼ Give the students a chance to study in at least two European countries.
ïƒ¼ Offer multiple or joint Masterâ€™s degrees at the end of successful completion of the program.
Erasmus Mundus degrees have earned a reputation as highly competitive masterâ€™s and doctoral (not available anymore) programs that offer students the opportunity to study at several European and partner universities, invariably leading to joint or multiple university degrees.
During this Master's program, a student has to study in at least two different universities in two different countries and also has the opportunity to study in more than two countries. Erasmus+ funds scholarships for students to take part in these master's programs. Last year (2022-2024 cohort) 151 Bangladeshi received this prestigious scholarship to study various Erasmus Mundus Master Programs throughout Europe. Globally, Bangladesh was in 3rd position that year regarding the number of scholarships winner. The amount of the scholarship can be 49K EURO (almost half a crore taka).
Erasmus Mundus scholarships cover a range of expenses, including tuition fees, travel costs, and living expenses. The program also provides support for academic staff to teach or conduct research at partner universities.
Feel free to fill up a Google form to attend this webinar:
https://docs.google.com/.../1FAIpQLSf3OlBTrWW.../viewform...

desc:
Many of us have a dream to go abroad for higher study. But we do fear about where to start preparing for higher study admission. Academically it is not possible for us to get that knowledge about the higher study. We get surrounded by sheets or books and forget about the preparation for higher study which is our dream. To make successful that dream IAAS Bangladesh PSTU came up with a wonderful program which is "Road to Abroad: A Complete Roadmap to Higher Study Abroad" sponsored by Anabia Agro Limited. It is one of our signature programs which is also good for the students of PSTU who want to go abroad.
We design this event with complete guidelines about the higher study. This hybrid event will be going to offer you amazing sessions. In the offline session, our speakers will talk about the preparation and guidelines of the scholarship, and in the Online session, our speakers will discuss specifically on different documents and procedures needed for the scholarship.

The Erasmus Mundus Association (EMA) founded in 2006 as an initiative of the European Commission (EC) is registered in Brussels as an international non-profit association under Belgian law (EMA AISBL). EMA is an association for students and alumni of Erasmus Mundus Joint Master's programs. EMA offers advice and inspiration for EMJM applicants.
